documentation.getting_started: Kilocode is a CLI-based autonomous AI coding assistant with built-in auto-approval and autonomous mode. Launch Kilocode with --auto for non-interactive operation and --yolo to auto-approve all tool permissions. Perfect for fully automated workflows.
tips: Use --auto flag for autonomous mode (non-interactive operation)
Use --yolo flag to auto-approve all tool permissions
Use --workspace to set the working directory
Kilocode supports multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
Use --json for JSON I/O mode for programmatic control
Use --parallel for parallel mode with automatic branching
The --timeout flag limits autonomous mode execution time
Kilocode automatically handles git operations without prompting
limitations: Requires API keys for AI models (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
Best for developers comfortable with terminal workflows
Autonomous mode requires careful prompt design
